name: THE CHRONICLE OF ASHES
description:
Notice: You will need a Gamepad to play it
  • An action rpg game inspired by Darksoul.
  • Player will control a knight to fight the boss
    • Use the joystick to move around and look around
    • Press the joystick to lock the enemy
    • Use A button to roll, use left bumper to jump, use left trigger to dash
    • For light attack, continually press x button to finish 3 different stages of attack.
    • For heavy attack, when you are not dashing, press y button to thrust and stab forward. When you are dashing, press y button to jump up and slam.
  • The Enemy Boss has different attack abilities, including melee attack and spells.
  • Defeat the boss as soon as possible!
